title: Flight Simulator 2020 - MSFS Update - Show 3d thermals in Sim Update 11
description:
As you might know the 40th anniversary edition of MSFS will contain gliders. Since gliders require you to use the thermals (if you a not towed) Sim Update 11 will have an option to show the thermals. In this video we will have a look how you can enable the option to show the thermals and will have a brief look at the effect of enabling that option.
